title: Tech News: Ubisoft Moving Toward Free to Play
itunes:title: Tech News: Ubisoft Moving Toward Free to Play
description:
Game developer Ubisoft is shifting toward more free-to-play titles, which generate revenue on a recurring basis. In this episode, we look at how video games traditionally made money and how that's all changing. And how will it affect the games that come out in the future?

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
